info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 6:22PM CDT until May 13 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Callahan County in west central Texas... Southeastern Jones County in west central Texas... Southwestern Shackelford County in west central Texas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 621 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake Fort Phantom Hill, or near Nugent, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Hamby around 630 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Lake Fort Phantom Hill and Us-283 Near The Callahan- Shackelford County Line. This includes Interstate 20 near Mile Marker 304. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
